name: Fruit Pig (Lunar Candor)
description:
This is not actively developed anymore, though I may remake it in Godot 4 at some point.

Catch falling fruit 🍋🍏🍓

A remake of the game from NES multicarts and ROMs.

Local files directories:

  • Windows: %appdata%\TheWildBlue\FruitPig
  • Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/thewildblue/fruitpig/
  • Linux: ~/.local/share/thewildblue/fruitpig/
